sentences.sContent: The Prize consists of a statuette - “the Nkosi” - and 100,000 euros, which are to be awarded to a direct aid project in the spirit of the young winner’s efforts.
sentences.sContent_eng: The Prize consists of a statuette - “the Nkosi” - and 100,000 euros, which are to be awarded to a direct aid project in the spirit of the young winner’s efforts.
sentences.sCn: 奖品是一座价值100，000欧元的“恩科西”小雕像，该奖旨在嘉奖年轻获奖者在直接参与帮助事件上所付出的精神努力。

sentences.sContent: Evidence also arrives in difficult-to-identify forms like a carved statuette, a belt, or a small vial of medicinal powder.
sentences.sContent_eng: Evidence also arrives in difficult-to-identify forms like a carved statuette, a belt, or a small vial of medicinal powder.
sentences.sCn: 到这儿的证物有时是种难以辨认的形式，像是刻过的雕像，皮带或是一小瓶药粉。

sentences.sContent: It seems alive, and even this funny statuette seems to have a soul.
sentences.sContent_eng: It seems alive, and even this funny statuette seems to have a soul.
sentences.sCn: 这座城市看起来活力四射，甚至这座有趣的小塑像好像也有灵魂。

trans.tranOther: a very small statue that can be put on a table or shelf
